snippet: Glen Campbell, who has Alzheimer’s disease, performed at Town Hall as part of his “Goodbye Tour.”
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews final tour performance by country music singer Glen Campbell at Town Hall.
lead_paragraph: Glen Campbell, who has Alzheimer’s disease, performed at Town Hall as part of his “Goodbye Tour.”

headline.seo: Glen Campbell’s Goodbye Tour at Town Hall - Review
headline.main: Campbell Says Goodbye With Sparkle and Guitar
